title: Implementation Consultant
description:
**ADP are hiring for a Implemenation Consultant to join our growing Implementation team!** 




  





**If you have experience in onboarding clients/project management and preferably implementing Hogia please keep reading!** 




  





**If you also have a background in payroll and are looking to move into implementation we would be interested in hearing from you.** 




  





**LOCATION: Östermalmstorg 1, 114 42 Stockholm, Sweden** 




**Hybrid working – 3 days in office and 2 days from home** 




  





**JOB PURPOSE:** 




 Working directly with the client to set expectations on go live date and getting ready for implementation of Hogia. Gatekeeper for system set-up and keeping the client warm until resource is assigned.
 



  





**RESPONSIBILITES:** 



* Works directly with clients remotely to agree delivery of contractual elements
* Work across projects of all levels of complexity including bespoke requirements
* Gate keeper of setting up systems
* Ensure all relevant reports are received from the client and validated before the project is assigned resource
* Works closely with the Allocation and Resourcing team to ensure effective use of resource
* Exercise judgement and provide guidance based on previous experience, practices, and precedents
* Acts as an interface with other departments
* Raising and handling escalation when required
* Address conflicts or problem situations as soon as possible by working directly with those involved
* Communicate to the wider teams consistently on updates for projects
* Contribute and participate in knowledge sharing and team development sessions
* Develop processes and procedures to meet the needs of the client and business



  





**REQUIREMENTS:** 



* A structured approach to managing workload and managing client expectations
* Networking skills making you a key point of contact for business users
* Ability to manage stakeholders and foster partnerships both internally and externally at different levels of the organisation
* Ability to maintain focus and work effectively to tight deadlines and multiple priorities
* Ability to manage 3rd party suppliers, driving them to deliver whilst maintaining a good relationships
* Analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to deal with numerous tasks simultaneously and with frequently changing priorities
* Excellent oral and written communication skills, particularly in completing relevant documentation
* Qualified vocational training/SALK/Further education or equivalent
* Good knowledge of pre-systems and Hogia salary plus/Flex HRM
* Project management
* Experience from other service profession/consultative work
* Microsoft 365, good skills in Excel
* Structured with good documentation habits
* Genuine interest in problem solving
* High integrity
* Taking responsibility, educational
* Proficient in speaking and writing Business English
* Proficient in speaking and writing Swedish
* GDPR



  





**BENEFITS:** 



* Pension scheme
* Hybrid working
* Internal training - access to a variety of internal courses and programs to upskill and provide CPD
* 30 days holiday
* Employee Assistance Program

title: Senior IT-tekniker
description:
Är det något du gillar så är det teknik! Du gillar känslan av att hjälpa människor, att få känna hur de uppskattar att någon som verkligen kan sin sak gör det begripligt för dem. Du är intresserad av teknik, nätverk och även såklart att ge god service. Du tycker om att kommunicera med människor och inser vikten av återkoppling. Du bör ha minst 4 års relevant arbetserfarenhet, samtidigt lägger vi stor vikt vid personlighet.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter:**
 Som IT-tekniker fokuserar du främst på att stödja och underhålla IT-miljön som används av organisationens anställda. Här är några av de huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifterna för en IT-tekniker inom workplace:
   

  

* Installation och konfiguration av arbetsplatser IT-teknikern ansvarar för att installera och konfigurera datorer, bärbara datorer, skrivare, telefoner och andra arbetsplatsenheter för användarna. Det innefattar att säkerställa att all hårdvara fungerar korrekt och är ansluten till företagets nätverk.
* Felsökning och problemhantering När användarna stöter på tekniska problem med sina arbetsplatser, såsom programvara som inte fungerar korrekt eller nätverksanslutningsproblem, är det IT-teknikerns ansvar att snabbt identifiera och lösa dessa problem. Detta kan innefatta att utföra fjärrsupport eller göra personliga besök för att åtgärda problemen.
* Säkerhetsuppdateringar och patchhantering IT-teknikern ser till att alla enheter inom workplace har uppdaterade säkerhetspatchar och programvaruversioner för att skydda mot säkerhetshot och sårbarheter. Detta kan innefatta att schemalägga och genomföra regelbundna uppdateringar samt att övervaka systemets säkerhetsstatus.
* Användarstöd och utbildning IT-teknikern tillhandahåller teknisk support och utbildning till användarna för att hjälpa dem att använda arbetsplatsens enheter och programvara effektivt. Detta kan inkludera att svara på frågor, lösa problem och ge råd om bästa praxis för att använda IT-resurserna.
* Dokumentation och rapportering IT-teknikern är ansvarig för att dokumentera alla installationer, konfigurationer och ändringar som görs i workplace-miljön. Detta inkluderar att upprätthålla inventarier över alla enheter och programvara samt att generera rapporter om prestanda och användning.
* Kontinuerlig förbättring Genom att analysera användarnas behov och utvärdera prestanda och säkerhet i workplace-miljön, arbetar IT-teknikern kontinuerligt med att identifiera möjligheter till förbättringar och effektiviseringar. Detta kan innefatta att föreslå nya tekniska lösningar eller processförbättringar för att optimera arbetsplatsens funktion och produktivitet.


**Kvalifikationer:**
* En utbildning inom IT/teknik, alternativt har relevant arbetserfarenhet
* Driv att arbeta med ständiga förbättringar
* Ett brinnande intresse för teknik
* Kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska i såväl tal som skrift


**💚 Human IT**
 Human IT handlar om att göra saker lite annorlunda, att på riktigt sätta våra anställda i fokus. Vi växer tillsammans och värdesätter engagemang och ambition. För oss är det viktigt att du får chansen att vara med och påverka vägen framåt.
   

  

 I utbyte erbjuder vi kompetens- och karriärutveckling genom varierande och utmanande uppdrag. Vi är inte branschinriktade och kan därför erbjuda en fantastisk variation bland uppdragen för dig som konsult. Självklart ser vi till att du får rätt utbildning och vi är väl medvetna om att det är det livslånga lärandet som bygger vår framgång.
   

  

 Tillsammans skapar vi framtiden 🚀
   

  

* Tillsvidareanställning med fast månadslön
* Kollektivavtal
* Vi tillämpar sex månaders provanställning, inklusive maxat friskvårdsbidrag
* Utvecklingsplan
* Hälsoförsäkring + pension
* Förskottssemester


**Start** 
 : Omgående med hänsyn till uppsägningstid och när säkerhetskontroll är genomförd. Uppdraget är på heltid och är tillsvidare.
   

  

**Plats** 
 : Stockholm
   

  

**Ansökan** 
 : Vi rekryterar löpande. Så skicka in din ansökan redan idag!
   

  

*Human IT arbetar tillsammans med Great Place To Work för att vi skall bli Sveriges bästa arbetsplats.*
**Och förresten:**
*Som en aktiv del i ett samhälle med kulturell och social mångfald är Human IT’s ambition att präglas av inkludering och bred representation, samt vara en arbetsplats med lika möjligheter för alla. Human IT anställer, bibehåller, befordrar och i övrigt behandlar alla medarbetare och kandidater efter erfarenhet, kvalifikationer och kompetens, oavsett kön, religion, ursprung, ålder, sexuell läggning, könsidentitet eller funktionsvariationer.*

title: !*Systems Administration Manager - Hybrid in Stockholm, Sweden - Leading Healthcare*!
company_industry: Pharmaceutical Manufacturing, Biotechnology Research, and Hospitals and Health Care
description:
**!\*Systems Administration Manager - Hybrid in Stockholm, Sweden - Leading Healthcare\*!**




  





**Location:** 
 Hybrid in Stockholm, Sweden
 



**FTE:** 
 Full time
 



**Start date:** 
 ASAP
 



**Rate:** 
 Incredible above market salary
 



  





**Job Description**




  





 Planet Pharma are working with a company specializing in providing advanced solutions and services in the medical and healthcare sector. It focuses on offering innovative technologies and products that improve patient care and clinical outcomes. By collaborating with healthcare professionals and organizations, the company develops tailored solutions to meet the evolving needs of the industry. Its expertise spans across various therapeutic areas, and the organization is committed to delivering high-quality products and services that enhance medical practices and operational efficiency.
 



  





**Primary Responsibilities:** 




  





**User Account Management:** 



* Provision, de-provision, and modify user accounts (internal and external) across various platforms, including eTMF, CTMS, and Microsoft 365/Entra AD.
* Address user or vendor access issues promptly.
* Ensure access permissions and group memberships comply with regulatory requirements and company policies.
* Identify opportunities to streamline and enhance user account management processes, including implementing automation or best practices to improve efficiency and compliance.



**System Maintenance:** 



* Conduct regular system reviews to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, system integrity, and fitness for purpose.
* Implement preventative and improvement-focused maintenance to optimize system availability and security.
* Coordinate with vendors for support, system integrations, and updates, ensuring adherence to GxP guidelines.
* Assist with system backups and updates.



**Documentation and Compliance:** 



* Create, review, and maintain detailed, audit-ready documentation for all user provisioning, system actions, and processes.
* Ensure IT systems comply with GxP regulations, company SOPs, and industry standards.
* Support audits by providing necessary documentation and addressing any identified gaps.



**Collaboration and Support:** 



* Partner with the Head of IT to identify and implement system improvements.
* Collaborate with departments to ensure efficient and secure access to all systems.
* Provide support for escalated user access issues and inquiries.
* Offer general IT support to team members across different regions.



  





**Requirements:** 



* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, IT, biotech, or a related field. Or equivalent relevant work experience.
* Strong experience in system administration in a regulated industry with the following systems: eTMF, CTMS, and Microsoft 365/Entra AD.
* Strong knowledge of IT security, access control strategies, and GxP documentation requirements.
* Experience with periodic system reviews and maintaining compliance documentation in a regulated industry.



  





 If you would like to discuss this vacancy further or to discuss your career options in confidence, please email me on: akilby@planet-pharma.co.uk
 



  





 If this role isn’t suitable for you, please let us know if you can refer anyone – any recommendations are much appreciated! Planet Pharma offers a competitive referral scheme so you will be rewarded for your help!
 



  






 About Planet Pharma
 




  





 Planet Pharma is an American parented Employment Business/Agency that provides global staffing services with its head-quarters in Chicago and our EMEA regional office located in Central London. We have invested significantly in creating a robust international platform that enables us to work compliantly in 30+ countries with a current network of 2500+ active contractors globally as well as a very strong permanent / direct hire recruitment offering.
 



 Our specialist knowledge and close relationships with our clients and the wider industry really makes us unique in our field. Just recently we were recognized by FORBES as the 17th best professional staffing firm, and have won multiple awards from industry accredited bodies for our commitment to excellence and service delivery. We have extensive functional expertise including: Regulatory Affairs, Pharmacovigilance, QA, QC, Submissions experts, Clinical development, Quality, Biostatistics, and Medical Affairs / Writing.
 



  






 We are an equal opportunities Recruitment Business and Agency.
 




*We welcome applications from all suitably qualified candidates regardless of their race, sex, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation or age.*

title: Information Security Officer
description:
**As an Information Security Officer, you’ll take the lead in protecting our systems and data. You’ll have the opportunity to influence and drive the future of information security in a workplace that values openness, collaboration, and innovation. With excellent development opportunities and a culture that encourages growth, this is the perfect place to take your career to the next level. Join us and make a real impact!**
**Your Responsibilities**
 Together with the Head of Information Security you’ll develop and implement the vision, strategy, and roadmap for the InfoSec team. This includes prioritizing and managing security initiatives to align with organizational goals. In this role, you’ll also provide comprehensive support across the organization, including system assessments, requirements setting, and guidance to system owners. This is a collaborative role where you’ll work closely with our legal team as well as other teams in the organization.
   

  

* Develop and implement information security strategies, policies, and guidelines
* Conduct risk assessments and vulnerability analyses
* Lead and drive security-related projects and initiatives
* Act as an advisor and expert on information security for the organization
* Manage security incidents and vulnerabilities
* Monitor and improve our security systems and processes
* Stay informed about trends and threats in information security


**Qualifications**
 We are looking for someone with experience working with information security, specifically experience in setting strategies and policies in a tech company. You probably have a degree in computer science, information systems, cybersecurity or another relevant education. In this role, it’s important that you are a good communicator and can explain technical issues in an easy-to-understand way. You should also be proactive and have the ability to identify and drive improvements.
   

  

* Knowledge of security standards and frameworks, e.g., ISO 27001, NIST, Cybersecurity Framework, and GDPR
* Experience working with or knowledge in incident management, vulnerability management and risk assessment
* Ability to work both independently and as part of a team
* Excellent communication and presentation skills
* Experience in leading and driving projects


**Join us at Hemnet!**
 At Hemnet, you’ll find a supportive environment that fosters your professional development, with plenty of opportunities for learning, collaboration, and fun along the way. As Sweden’s most popular property portal, Hemnet has been part of life’s major milestones since 1998, helping millions find their homes. Join a forward-thinking team in a dynamic workplace that combines the stability of an established company with a culture that values every voice.
   

  

 Hemnet is Sweden’s largest property platform. Since the start in 1998, we have been the natural meeting place for real estate agents, property sellers and buyers. Hemnet offers the majority of properties for sale on the market; the largest number of potential buyers; products through which sellers are able to influence the selling of their property - and products that give real estate agents the opportunity to strengthen their brand. We are one of Sweden’s largest sites and apps, and one of the most popular property platforms in the world based on population.

title: Helpdesk Manager
job_function: Information Technology, Customer Service, and Administrative
company_industry: Pharmaceutical Manufacturing, IT System Training and Support, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Det vi gör på Tech spelar en avgörande roll i att förverkliga Apotekets affärsstrategi. Vi strävar efter att vara en ledande aktör i vår bransch och möta de utmaningar som följer med snabba förändringar inom organisationen och omvärlden.
 



 Som ledare på Apoteket Tech bidrar du till vårt uppdrag – att skapa bättre hälsa för varje individ och samhället i stort.
 



  





 Vi söker nu en Helpdesk Manager som kombinerar teknisk kompetens med starkt ledarskap för att ta vår IT-support till nästa nivå.
 



  





**Helpdesk manager på Apoteket** 




 Som Helpdesk Manager ansvarar du för att leda och utveckla vår helpdeskorganisation, säkerställa högkvalitativ IT-support och driva innovation i våra tjänster.
 



 Rollen rapporterar till Head of Digital Infrastructure, IT-Security and Operations och innebär nära samarbete med andra IT-funktioner och verksamheten i stort.
 



  





**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsområden** 



* Leda, coacha och utveckla helpdesk-teamet
* Säkerställa snabb och effektiv hantering av ärenden enligt ITIL-processer och SLA:er
* Optimera och automatisera servicedeskens arbetsflöden och rutiner för att förbättra effektiviteten och användarnöjdheten
* Samarbeta med verksamheten för att optimera tjänsteleveranser och förbättra användarupplevelsen
* Analysera prestanda genom KPI:er och SLA-rapporter samt presentera förbättringsförslag
* Driva initiativ för att utveckla tjänsteleveranser och säkerställa att vi är redo för framtidens tekniska utmaningar



  





**Dina kompetenser** 




 Vi söker en erfaren och engagerad ledare med teknisk förståelse och dokumenterad erfarenhet av att utveckla team, gärna inom helpdesk eller IT-support.
 



 Du är lösningsorienterad, strukturerad och har en naturlig förmåga att skapa engagemang och inspirera ditt team. Du är nyfiken och vågar ifrågasätta befintliga rutiner samtidigt som du letar efter innovativa tekniska möjligheter för att förbättra processer och användarupplevelsen.
 



  





**Utöver detta vill vi att du har** 



* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att leda och utveckla team, inom helpdesk eller IT-support
* Erfarenhet av att driva förändringsinitiativ och implementera förbättringar
* Förståelse för IT-infrastruktur och tjänster
* Goda kunskaper inom ITIL-processer och erfarenhet av helpdesk-verktyg.
* ITIL-certifiering är meriterande
* Erfarenhet av att implementera automatiseringslösningar eller självbetjäning i servicedeskar är meriterande



  





**När det känns rätt** 




 Fundera inte för länge. Låt oss i stället berätta om rollen och om verksamheten så kan du sen avgöra om det känns rätt för dig. Ansök nu!
 



 Vi vill att din ansökan består av ditt CV samt svar på våra urvalsfrågor. Du behöver alltså inte skicka med ett personligt brev. Urvalsfrågorna hjälper oss att bättre förstå din erfarenhet och dina kvalifikationer för den aktuella rollen och öka vår träffsäkerhet.
 



 Urval och intervjuer sker löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum.
 



 Välkommen till Apoteket!

title: Technical Support Manager
description:
**Xensam: SAM Disrupters** 




 Xensam is the leading provider of AI-powered, cloud-hosted Software Asset Management technology. We’re looking for key players to join us as we scale our impact and build the Xensam team together. We take our culture seriously and strive to maintain the excellence, energy & enthusiasm that flows through the organization today.
 



  





 We look for candidates who are passionate about what they do and ready to work the Xensam way. We know that experience counts, but we also know that it’s you, the person behind the experience, that makes it count.
 



  





**About the role** 




 We are looking for a dynamic and experienced
 **Support Manager for our B2B SaaS solution,** 
 to lead and scale our global support team. In this role, you will oversee a team of support technicians located across multiple locations, ensuring the delivery of exceptional technical support to our clients.
 



  





 As our Support Manager, you will play a key role in shaping the future of our support operations as we plan to rapidly scale it up over the coming years. This position requires occasional travel to our other offices in Europe and potentially the US, aligning with our global expansion strategy.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 




**Team Leadership & Development** 



* Lead, mentor, and manage a geographically distributed support team.
* Recruit, onboard, and train new team members as the support function scales.



**Operational Excellence** 



* Oversee daily operations of the technical support team to ensure timely resolution of client issues.
* Develop and implement best practices for workflows, tools, and processes to enhance efficiency and client satisfaction.



**Strategic Planning** 



* Design a scalable support strategy aligned with Xensam’s growth trajectory and global footprint.
* Plan for resource needs, training programs, and advanced tools to meet future demands.



**Customer-Centric Focus** 



* Ensure that all customer interactions reflect Xensam’s commitment to excellence and innovation.
* Act as an escalation point for complex or high-priority issues while maintaining strong relationships with key clients.



**Performance Monitoring & Reporting** 



* Track key performance indicators (KPIs) such as response times, resolution rates, and customer satisfaction scores.
* Provide regular reports to senior management with insights and recommendations for improvement.



**Cross-Functional Collaboration** 



* Work closely with Product Development, Sales, and Customer Success teams to address client needs and provide feedback for continuous product improvement.
* Actively contribute to enhancing the user experience of Xensam’s SAM platform by relaying customer insights.



  





**Qualifications** 



* **Minimum of 5+ years in technical software support.**
* Exceptional leadership abilities with a proven track record of inspiring high-performing teams, with at least 2 years experience in a leadership role.
* Proven experience managing geographically distributed teams.
* Experience working with support functions in SaaS or technology-driven companies.
* Strong understanding of IT systems, software troubleshooting, networking, and ticketing tools.
* Familiarity with ITIL frameworks or similar service management methodologies is an advantage.
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Swedish.
* Strong analytical skills to identify trends in customer issues and implement effective solutions proactively.



  





**Bonus points if you have** 



* Relevant certifications such as ITIL Foundation or HDI Support Center Manager (HDI-SCM).
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Administration, or related fields.



  





**What you get** 



* A dynamic position embracing "freedom under responsibility".
* Three days in-office (with remote work on Mondays and Fridays).
* Free access to beverages, snacks, gym facilities, on-site massage, shuffleboard, and other games.
* If sales targets are met, all employees enjoy an annual destination trip.
* Join an ambitious and diverse team, and work with cutting-edge technology in the fastest-growing SAM software on the market.
* An opportunity to shape your career growth while contributing to the company’s success.



  





**At Xensam, our core values define our culture** 




**Rebellious** 
 : We encourage a spirit of freedom and initiative within responsibility.
 



**Humane** 
 : We foster a caring, inclusive environment that values diversity and respects individuality.
 



**Harmonious** 
 : We promote work-life balance, creating a pleasant, supportive workplace.
 



 Join Xensam for a balanced, collaborative, and growth-focused work environment. If you're a team player ready to thrive,
 **APPLY now!** 




  





 As part of our recruitment process, we conduct background checks on final candidates to fulfill our commitments to customers and ensure a safe work environment.

title: Specialistkompetens
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 Driver, tillsammans med tjänsteansvariga, tjänsteportföljen för molntjänster respektive managerade tjänster.
   

  

 Driver, tillsammans med ledningen, utvecklingen av verksamhetsstrukturer kring att vara leverantör av molntjänster respektive manageringstjänster
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Minst 4 års arbetslivserfarenhet av IT verksamhetsutveckling
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av inom en Driftsorganisation
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av byggt och utvecklat säljbara IT tjänster (HW/SW) från privat organisation eller myndighet företrädelsevis inom drift och Infra


**Meriterande**
* Arbetslivserfarenhet av myndighet


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 14-01-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Product Lead, Autonomous Deliveries
description:
**Job Description**
 We are looking for a Product Lead to join the
 **Autonomous Deliveries** 
 Team,
 **Courier** 
 group. The Courier group at Wolt operates with the mission of providing a high-quality delivery experience for our Consumers, becoming the most-loved platform for Couriers, and being the most efficient logistics engine in the industry.
   

  

 Autonomous deliveries is a new team within the Courier group that is focused on revolutionizing logistics by integrating autonomous vehicles, such as drones and robots, into Wolt’s delivery operations. Logistics is at the heart of Wolt’s business, and mastering it can mean the difference between creating seamless, delightful customer experiences and dealing with operational chaos.
   

  

 The Product Lead for Autonomous Deliveries will drive the vision and execution of building scalable and end-end autonomous delivery experiences for our consumers, working cross-functionally across Consumer, Merchant, and Support product teams at Wolt, as well as leading critical integration discussions with Wolt’s autonomous delivery partners. This high-visibility role shapes the future of delivery, transforming each delivery into an opportunity to build delight and loyalty.
   

  

 As a Product Lead, you will work with a cross-functional team of incredibly talented engineers, designers, product people, and analysts in a high-visibility role. You will be responsible for defining the roadmap and setting the vision for your team. This involves leading multiple projects and cross-team product initiatives across the entire product lifecycle, partnering with business and operations stakeholders, and understanding our end-users better than anyone.
   

  

**Our humble expectations**
 You could come to this role from a multitude of different backgrounds, but ideally, you have
   

  

* Plenty of experience as a Product Manager/Lead, preferably in e-commerce or on-demand delivery. Experience within the autonomous delivery space would be a plus.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, and have proven ability to influence cross-functional teams
* A mixture of data analysis skills, engineering understanding, and business savvy with the go-getter attitude of a "could-be start-up CEO"
* Expertise in how to work with and coach cross-functional teams, at least with developers, finance, data experts and engineering teams


**Next Steps**
 The position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!
   

  

 The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash RSUs. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.
   

  

 For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Elif Dilan Ayaz (elifdilan.ayaz@wolt.com).
 **Please note that we do not accept applications or cover letters sent by mail. You should submit your application only through our careers website.**
**About Wolt**
 Wolt is a Helsinki-based technology company that provides an online platform for consumers, merchants and couriers. It connects people looking to order food and other goods with people interested in selling and delivering them. To enable this, Wolt develops a wide range of technologies from local logistics to retail software and financial solutions – as well as operating its own grocery stores under the Wolt Market brand. Wolt’s products include Wolt+ (subscription service for customers), Wolt for Work (meal benefits and office deliveries for companies), Wolt Drive (fast last-mile deliveries for merchants) and Wolt Self-Delivery (service for merchant partners with their own delivery staff). Wolt’s mission is to make cities better by empowering and growing local communities. Wolt was founded in 2014 and joined forces with DoorDash in 2022. DoorDash operates in 29 countries today, 25 of which are with the Wolt product and brand.
   

  

**Working in Product Development at Wolt**
 At Wolt, we’re about getting things done. You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.
   

  

 The behind the scenes of Wolt is run by an awesome bunch of over 700+ planners, builders, designers and data crunchers. We call ourselves Product+, as we’re the very core of Wolt’s products, tools and platforms. To build our products, we work in over 60 cross-functional, independent and autonomous teams. Teams are made up of a mix of talented individuals: engineers, designers, data scientists, analysts, and product leads. Each team takes ownership for solving customer problems in the best possible way.
   

  

**Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion**
 We want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.
   

  

 Join us today to build Wolt together.

title: IT Data Management Expert (m/f/d)
description:
**Company Description**
 EIT RawMaterials is at the forefront of addressing Europe's increasing demand for raw materials amidst the transition towards green energy and sustainability. With a focus on innovation, collaboration, and education, we aim to drive the growth of clean technologies and support the EU's climate-neutrality goals. Our network of over 300 partners facilitates dynamic partnerships to foster innovation and education initiatives across the raw materials sector.
   

  

 Position
   

  

 Our team is currently looking for an IT Data Management Expert.
   

  

**Tasks Will Include**
* Liaising with IT and software solution providers and ensure efficient data management using Azure and Power BI embedded
* Liaising with content experts and legal team on Data security and IP + Integration of Power BI Dashboards and Apps in Office 365 environment (linking with Sharepoint and internal SQL database) + Creating improved user access to Sharepoint Document Libraries + Linking Sharepoint Document Libraries and external data to Power BI Establish best practice data management + Establish automated standard procedures (Power Automate)
* Managing inhouse commodity market database and IT related aspects


**Requirements**
* A Master’s degree in an IT or data science related subject
* The IT person needs to be an expert in Sharepoint, Power BI, Power Automate, Excel and database design and management (including Azure knowledge). PowerQuery, DAX, SQL, Office 365 integration, fluency in English and great interpersonal skills and communication skills.
* Solid experience in project management
* Additional STEM background would be a plus
* Knowledge about Hadoop and Spark
* Proficiency in AI and other Understanding of Latest Tools for Data Processing
* Excellent analytical skills
* A service oriented and customer focussed working mentality
* Excellent verbal, written and presentation skills
* Fluency in spoken and written English
* Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team
* Advanced computer literacy with good knowledge of business software applications (MS Office)
* Ability to work efficiently and to tight deadlines
* Excellent planning and organisational skills


 Personal attributes
   

  

* Enjoy working in a team strong interpersonal skills
* Eager to learn new skills and processes
* Positive and pro-active attitude as well as a hands-on approach
* Willing to adapt to quickly changing priorities
* Self-directed, flexible and able to prioritise work in a fast-paced environment.


 Other information
   

  

 We encourage all kinds of diversity in our organization.
   

  

 This position is temporary, limited to a three-year contract, with a provision for extension.
   

  

 The vacancy will remain available for applications until the decision on the successful candidate is made.

title: Head of IT Infrastructure
description:
**Are you our new Head of IT Infrastructure?** 




 Are you a visionary leader with a passion for building and maintaining world-class IT infrastructure? Do you have the expertise to lead a team in delivering robust, scalable, and secure IT solutions? We are looking for a
 **Head of IT Infrastructure** 
 to drive our infrastructure strategy and development, ensuring our technology backbone supports our business growth.
 



  





  





**What will you do:** 




 As the
 **Head of IT Infrastructur** 
 e, you will be responsible for overseeing all aspects of our IT infrastructure, including data centers, networks, servers, workplace and cloud services. Your leadership will be key in ensuring the reliability, scalability, and security of our IT environment, enabling our business to thrive in a competitive landscape. You will collaborate closely with your peers in Operations, Service Management and Development, and our various partners.
 



  




* **Strategic Leadershi** 
 p: Develop and execute a comprehensive IT infrastructure strategy that aligns with the company’s business objectives and digital transformation goals.
* **Infrastructure Managemen** 
 t: Oversee the management and optimization of our data centers, networks, servers, storage, and cloud platforms.
* **Team Leadershi** 
 p: Lead, mentor, and grow a team of IT professionals, fostering a culture of excellence, collaboration, and innovation.
* **Security & Complianc** 
 e: Ensure the highest levels of security and compliance across all IT infrastructure, proactively addressing risks and implementing best practices.
* **Vendor Managemen** 
 t: Manage relationships with key technology vendors and service providers, ensuring the best value and performance.
* **Disaster Recovery & Business Continuit** 
 y: Develop and maintain robust disaster recovery and business continuity plans to ensure the resilience of our IT systems.
* **Budget Managemen** 
 t: Oversee the IT infrastructure budget, ensuring cost-effective solutions while delivering high-quality services.



  





**What we´re looking for:** 



* **Extensive Experience:** 
 10+ years of experience in IT infrastructure, with at least 5 years in a leadership role.
* **Technical Experti** 
 se: Deep knowledge of IT infrastructure components, including networks, servers, storage, virtualization, and cloud services.
* **Leadership Skil** 
 ls: Proven ability to lead and inspire a diverse team of IT professionals, driving performance and innovation.
* **Strategic Thinki** 
 ng: Strong ability to develop and execute infrastructure strategies that align with business objectives.
* **Problem-Solving Abili** 
 t
 **y:** 
 Excellent analytical skills with the ability to troubleshoot complex infrastructure issues and implement effective solutions.
* **Security & Compliance Knowled** 
 ge: In-depth understanding of IT security principles and regulatory requirements.



**Location:** 
 Stockholm or Gothenburg. We offer the option of hybrid working. Travelling will be required.
 



  





**Why Intrum?** 



* Working for us means working for the international market leader. This not only sounds great but also means collaborating with the best people, the most exciting clients, the latest market innovations, and the highest ethical standards.
* Our business is about helping others. We assist individuals in debt to get out of difficult situations and help companies get paid so they can grow, employ, and prosper. This, in turn, positively impacts the entire economy. You become an essential part of this circuit with us, giving your job at Intrum a deeper meaning, regardless of your role or title.



  





**We Offer:** 



* A challenging, exciting, and developing position in an international company with growth ambitions.
* Highly motivated and skilled co-workers globally.
* Being part of a supportive culture where effort counts.
* Opportunity for professional growth and development.



  





**About Intrum:** 




 Intrum is the industry-leading provider of credit management services across 20 markets in Europe. By helping companies to get paid and support people with their late payments, Intrum leads the way to a sound economy and plays a critical role in society at large.Intrum has circa 10,000 dedicated professionals who serve around 80,000 companies across Europe. At Intrum we consider everybody to be a leader. We lead ourselves when collaborate to meet the needs of our clients and customers. We are all accountable to our actions as well as trust and care for each other. This makes us all leaders, independent of role or responsibility, and this is reflected in our 3 leadership principles: Deliver Impact, Inspire Trust and Embrace Growth.
 



  





**How to Apply:** 
 If you are ready to take on a critical leadership role in IT infrastructure, we would love to hear from you! : If you are interested in this position and believe you have the right qualifications, please send your English CV and a cover letter via the “apply button”
 



 \*\*Please note that as a multinational company, we have Talent Acquisition Partners in multiple locations. You might receive a call from our recruiters with a Spanish, Latvian or Greek phone number.\*\*
 



 At Intrum we strive to create a diverse and inclusive workplace. We encourage applicants from all backgrounds to apply.

title: Huvudarkitekt IT
description:
*Är du redo att ta ansvar för att forma framtidens IT-arkitektur? Vi söker erfarna personer som vill axla rollen som huvudarkitekt inom Advania och bidra med sin erfarenhet och kompetens för att bygga det bästa teamet!* 



 Huvudarkitekt IT på Advania 🚀
 
 Hos Advania är vi engagerade i att hjälpa våra kunder att utnyttja teknikens fulla potential. Som Huvudarkitekt IT får du en nyckelroll i att utforma och implementera avancerade IT-arkitekturer som stöder våra IT-tjänster, digital transformation och affärstillväxt. Du kommer att ha ansvar för att leda utvecklingen av högteknologiska lösningar och säkerställa att våra tjänster hålls i teknikens framkant. Du kommer ha en ledande roll i våra större projekt där vi tar emot nya kunder.
 



**I rollen som Huvudarkitekt IT kommer du att arbeta med att:** 



* Leda arbetet med att designa och implementera skalbara och robusta IT-arkitekturer för Advanias managerade tjänster.
* Ansvara för den tekniska arkitekturen i våra större transitionsprojekt för att matcha Advanias leverans med kundernas behov.
* Samarbeta med interna team och kunder för att identifiera och analysera krav och behov och utforma lösningar som möter dessa.
* I ett team av seniora arkitekter kontinuerligt utveckla strategier för att optimera IT-infrastrukturen och tjänsterna över tid.
* Vara en teknisk rådgivare vid införandet av nya teknologier och tjänster.


 Vad vi söker hos dig ✨
 
 För att lyckas i denna roll ser vi att du har en mycket gedigen erfarenhet av IT-arkitektur, mycket god teknisk förståelse och gärna med en bakgrund som teknisk specialist inom något område. Då många av våra kunder har höga regulatoriska krav på säkerhet och har en delad miljö med både private & public cloud är erfarenhet av detta meriterande. Du är strategisk men har samtidigt ett praktiskt förhållningssätt till problemlösning. Vi tror att du trivs med att arbeta i en dynamisk och tekniskt komplex miljö där din insats gör skillnad. Det faller sig naturligt för dig att ta ledarrollen i framtagande av tekniska lösningar och vid problemlösning. Du har även god förståelse för kommersiella krav och ekonomisk påverkan i lösningsarbetet.
 



**Vi söker dig som har:** 



* Minst 10 års erfarenhet inom IT-arkitektur och ledande tekniska roller.
* Mycket god kunskap inom områden såsom molnlösningar (Privata och Publika), nätverksinfrastruktur och säkerhet.
* Erfarenhet av att leda komplext lösningsarbete med flera teknikområden och specialister involverade.
* Erfarenhetav att ta fram lösningsdokumentation och beskrivningar i syfte att presentera för kund.
* Flytande svenska i tal och skrift.


**Det är meriterande om du har:** 
* Relevant certifiering inom IT-arkitektur.
* Erfarenhet av ledande befattningar ex teamchef, konsultchef eller liknande.


 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan! 👋
 
 Visa gärna ditt intresse så snart som möjligt då vi intervjuar löpande. Vi välkomnar ansökningar från personer med olika bakgrunder, erfarenheter och perspektiv, då vi värdesätter mångfald och kreativitet som bidrar till vår gemensamma framgång.
 



 Som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår våra slutkandidater en obligatorisk bakgrundskontroll, en viktig del för oss i vårt beslutsfattande.
 



 Tveka inte att kontakta oss om du har några frågor eller funderingar.

title: AWS Infra Architect & Migration Expert
description: Hands-on• Self-going• Analytical• Problem solving mindset• Proficient in navigating in legacy IT landscape• Proficient in information sharing• Proficient in documenting work done• Proficient in Swedish.Migration projects migrating from Windows on prem to AWS• Migration of windows servers to AWS• Setup landing zones for windows components• Maintenance/operations• Management of legacy applications• Planning and orchestrating successful large scale cloud migrations.• Knowledge transfer and upskilling of internal teams during migration.• Setting up and managing governance frameworks for decision-making and risk management for migration projects.• Managing the AWS migration acceleration program during migration projects to offset migration and dual run-costs for clients.• Building out AWS environments within Swedish FSI.Helsingborg/Malmö/Stockholm (Travels to and from HQ in Helsingborg could occur on a semi-regular basis).Proficient in dependency mapping and migration planning• Skilled in automation tools (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation).• Microsoft Windows eco-system / Microsoft suite• AWS• AD• SQL• Network /Firewall• Wide range of technical skills preferred

title: IT-specialist Betala
description:
*Är du en driven IT-specialist med passion för bank- och betalningslösningar? Vill du vara med och forma framtidens betalinfrastruktur hos Länsförsäkringar Bank? Då är detta möjligheten för dig! Vi söker nu en engagerad IT-specialist till vår dynamiska IT-Betalagrupp.*
**Om jobbet**
 Rollen som IT-specialist Betala innebär att ansvara för att Betalagruppens IT-förändringar säkerställs från idé till leverans samt att säkerställa att verksamhets- och IT-relaterade krav är beredda och detaljerade i enlighet med gällande riktlinjer.
   

  

 Som IT-specialist ingår att ansvara för att Länsförsäkringar Bank är förberedda för och anpassade till den nya betalinfrastrukturen samt ISO20022. Rollen innebär även att säkerställa Betalas representation på operativ nivå inom Svenska Betalningar, Realtidsbetalningar, Utlandsbetalningar och Kort.
   

  

 Arbetet bedrivs enligt det lean-agila ramverket SAFe i tåget Mina Betalningar. Rollen är en del av IT Betala och samverkar med övriga medarbetare i Betala samt med kollegor inom Länsförsäkringar Bank, Länsbolagen och Länsförsäkringar AB. Du rapporterar till Chef IT Betala inom Affärsenhet Bank.
   

  

 Dina arbetsuppgifter kommer vara bland annat:
   

  

* Att krav är beredda och detaljerade i enlighet med gällande riktlinjer, gäller både verksamhets- och IT-relaterade krav
* Att granska och sammanställa ärendeestimat (tid och kostnad) samt godkänna beställningar innan de skickas till leverantör eller Team i betalatåget
* Att lägga leverantörsbeställningar och säkerställa att leveranser från externa parter är i enlighet med beställning och leveranstidpunkter
* Att säkerställa att IT-komponenterna är uppdaterade och att arbetet utförs i enlighet med definierade mål
* Att agera som internt tekniskt stöd för MIG (Migration Implementation Guidelines) och säkerställa att dessa är uppdaterade och kommunicerade till intressenter
* Att planera och utföra långsiktig förvaltning på relevanta applikationer och tjänster samt initiera förändringar och förbättringar i IT-komponenter
* Att säkerställa att det finns tekniska förutsättningar samt testdata för att genomföra acceptans- och regressionstest enligt gällande testprocess


**Vem är du?**
 Följande kommer göra dig framgångsrik i denna tjänst:
   

  

* Mycket god kännedom om ISO 20022 och erfarenhet av arbete med detta
* Mycket goda kunskaper i engelska
* Erfarenhet från bankverksamhet och inom Betala och Kort-området
* Erfarenhet från att ställa krav och IT-utveckling i applikationer och system
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta lean agilt, gärna utifrån SAFe-ramverket


 Meriterande är även om du har:
   

  

* Erfarenhet från att ha arbetat med anpassningen till den nya svenska betalinfrastrukturen
* Erfarenhet inom kortutgivning


 Som person har du ett starkt engagemang för att driva arbete som leder till förbättringar för bankens kunder och medarbetare. Du har förmåga att skapa ordning och struktur i komplexa frågeställningar. Du är flexibel och inspireras av varierande arbetsuppgifter samt levererar enligt uppsatta mål. Du har en stark förmåga att samarbeta och sätter laget före jaget. Du är positiv, nyfiken och engagerande.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Betalagruppen består av 11 personer inklusive gruppchef. Gruppen består av Agile Product Owners, IT-specialister, Scrum Master och lösningsarkitekter. Vi är seniora medarbetare med lång erfarenhet och djup kompetens inom respektive arbetsområde.
   

  

 Betalagruppen ansvarar för bankens betalprodukter för företagskunder och privatkunder samt säkerställer bankens förflyttning till den nya betalinfrastrukturen och anpassningen till ISO 20022. Vi arbetar mycket aktivt med att anpassa oss till lean-agilt arbetssätt enligt SAFe-ramverket.
   

  

 Hos oss får du möjlighet att vara med och påverka bankens framtida betalerbjudande till både privat- och företagskunder. Vi trivs med att vara framåtsträvande och gillar att arbeta tillsammans. Vi respekterar varandra och har kul på jobbet!
   

  

**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande? Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*
**Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-01-23**

title: System Administrator
description:
Bli en del av oss på Digital Services, vi gör skillnad i samhället! Våra extremt kompetenta team ser bland annat till att logistikkedjorna i Sverige fungerar, att dina Kivra-besked når din inkorg, och att din inloggning till tusentals e-tjänster fungerar dygnet runt.
 



  





 Som System Administrator hos oss får du arbeta med allt från säkerhetsarbete och automation till systemdesign och nätverk, i ett dynamiskt team som värdesätter dina idéer och din insats. Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
 



  





**Placeringsort: Malmö, Göteborg eller Stockholm** 




  





**Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter** 




 Hos oss kommer du att ha en varierad och spännande arbetsdag. Beroende på Dina egna intressen kan det röra sig om: säkerhetsarbete, automation, patchning, systemdesign, larmhantering & övervakning, nätverk, uppgraderingar, felsökning, logganalyser, databasarbete, dokumentation, medverkande i diverse olika projekt, produktionssättning av mjukvaror, releasehantering etc.
 



  





 Våra team, som består av 3-6 personer, leds av en Team Leader eller en SCRUM Master. Teamen är geografiskt utspridda, men trots det lyckas vi ändå skapa en stark teamkänsla med hjälp av digitala verktyg och fysiska träffar.
 



  





**Kvalifikationer för att bli framgångsrik denna roll** 




 För denna roll behövs erfarenhet av att arbeta med Linux och/eller Windows Server. God kommunikativ förmåga på svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
 



  





 Vi söker dig som har ett starkt engagemang och eget driv, och som tar ansvar för din egen utveckling. Du är analytisk och har ett positivt förhållningssätt, vilket hjälper dig att lösa problem och bidra till teamets framgång.
 



  





**To applicants: please note that this position requires Swedish language skills on a professional level, verbally as well as in writing.** 




  





 Meriterande kvalifikationer inkluderar erfarenhet av applikatorisk och infrastrukturell drift, nätverk och teknisk kommunikation, säkerhetsarbete, containerisering, logghantering, scriptning och programmering, databaskunskap, dokumentation och ledarskap.
 



  





 Det är även ett plus om man har erfarenhet av något system såsom, StreamServe, Inspire Automation, Inspire Interactive, Inspire Scaler, ABBYY, FrontCollect, ActiveBatch, Prisma, Seeburger BIS, Elastic, ContentManagerOnDemand (CMOD)
 



  





 Högskole- eller Universitetsutbildning är meriterande, men ej ett krav. Yrkesutbildning är likaså meriterande, liksom certifieringar inom nätverk, Scrum, ITIL, samt erfarenhet av att arbeta i en driftsmiljö med kunderna i fokus.
 



  





 Låter detta som något för dig? Tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan och bli en del av vårt framgångsrika team!
 



  





 Har du frågor om tjänsten kontakta gärna reryterande chef Patrik Kosowski, patrik.kosowski@cgi.com eller Marcio Goncalves, marcio.goncalves@cgi.com
 



  





**Låt oss som ägare omvandla verklig insikt till handling – tillsammans.** 




 Livet på CGI bygger på ägande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhörighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna nå din fulla potential.
 



  





 Du är inbjuden att ta ägandeskap redan från första dagen i vårt arbete med att förverkliga vår dröm om att skapa en arbetsmiljö där vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgången för vårt företag. Det är därför vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare än anställda. Vi drar nytta av vår kollektiva framgång och tillsammans får vi möjlighet att aktivt forma vår företagsstrategi och inriktning.
 



  





 Ditt arbete skapar värde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lösningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du får tillgång till globala möjligheter att skala upp dina idéer, omfamna nya möjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.
 



  





 Du kommer att forma din karriär tillsammans med ett företag som är byggt för att växa och bestå. Du får stöd av ledare som bryr sig om din hälsa och ditt välbefinnande och ger dig möjligheter att fördjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
 



  





 Bli en del en av världens största leverantörer av IT- och affärskonsulttjänster.

title: Account Executive Sweden
description:
**Account Executive Sweden** 




  





 At our client, their employees are the key to their global success. They are industry leaders due to the innumerable talents of their approximately 5000 strong professional team. Their people thrive in an entrepreneurial and culturally-diverse environment, where innovative thinking, collaboration and efficient execution are highly valued. Their high-performance culture is what allows them to drive sustained growth. Stronger together, they promote an environment where individuals can thrive.
 



  




* POSITION: Account Executive
* BUSINESS SEGMENT: Global Energy Management, Sustainability, Supply & Trade
* POSITION LOCATION:
 **Sweden, Stockholm or Malmö area**



  





**Responsibilities** 




 The Account Executive supports their relevant line managers for overall accountability for a portfolio of customer accounts from end to end, from initial sales to the delivery of services and maximizing revenue opportunities. They currently offer various energy and sustainability services to customers throughout the EMEA region.
 



 The Account Executive will manage the sales pipeline, build customer relationships, and ensure they deliver services and solutions exceeding their customers’ expectations with support from the Client Manager. The Account Executive will manage customer accounts, foster strong relationships, and drive business growth.
 



  





**Essential duties and responsibilities include** 



* Owns a book of assigned customers for whom they hold accountability on account for all business targets:
* Drives performance through targets and metrics.
* Delivers growth and profitability across their respective areas.
* Builds a relationship with the Client Manager and develops an account management approach that reduces task duplication and promotes efficiency and timely solutions.
* Retention – takes a pragmatic view on the key areas on which to retain customers and grow their services with us.
* “Closes the deal” on new business and/or renewal of existing business and customer activity.
* Identifies and engages in opportunities to upsell and cross-sell additional products and services to assigned customers. Depending on the services and products identified, such cross-selling may require collaboration or “handing off” of opportunity to Account Executives in other segments or with specialized subject matter expertise needed to close the deal. However, you remain the lead of all your accounts.
* Partners with the Client Manager organization to manage the customer relationship.
* Works closely with Client Manager and fulfillment to ensure all committed contracted terms are delivered to the customer, including all SLAs.
* Is responsible for following all credit guidelines and internal compliance processes to ensure customer guidelines and contract terms are followed on each offering/service.
* Manages allocated customers’ new services & renewal and associated contractual framework, including deal approval process, pricing, service description, legal, and creditworthiness for potential and existing customers.
* Actively prospects for new business opportunities based on marketing intel, global and regional sales leadership direction, portfolio referrals, and own lead information.
* Market trends – Is permanently up-to-speed on market trends and customer activities and anticipates market dynamics that would impact the book of customers’ future business. Remains up to speed on all of our current and possible core/service offerings in order to identify opportunities for upselling additional products or services.
* Mentors other members of the team, including training their teams to grow knowledge and experience appropriate for their roles.
* Collaborate with internal teams, to ensure customers’ needs are met effectively.



  





**Background and skills** 



* The successful candidate will likely have vast and proven experience in an Account Management and Sales role, preferably in energy, sustainability, or risk management.
* Strong network/relationship-building skills and a drive to deliver sound solutions to our customers are essential. Having an in-depth background in sustainability, energy management and consulting services is critical.
* Strong sales and business acumen to enable successful sales to new customers is essential. A strong network and a passion for the services we currently sell and our ability to sell in the future are critical.
* Experience in customer-facing sales and account management is vital. Proven experience in growing and delivering a proven business pipeline across all aspects of its management with pace and accuracy.
* Willingness and ability to travel is essential.
* Robust interpersonal skills with the ability to deal with all levels of the business hierarchy are essential.
* Team working and collaboration experience and skills, as well as ability to work within a matrix organization, are essential.
* IT skills and experience or readiness to learn new sales and CRM tools is essential
* Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, in English and Swedish

title: Ekonomi/Applications Specialist
description:
Nyfiken på hur din redovisnings- och ekonomibakgrund kan
 



 vara till nytta i IT-branschen? Vi söker en Specialist
 



 till vårt team!
 



  





 Skulle du tycka det var riktigt kul att arbeta i en verksamhet som
 



 digitaliserar och automatiserar ekonomiprocesser? Nu finns
 



 chansen att kliva in i rollen som specialist och bidra till den
 



 spännande tillväxtresa vi befinner oss i!
 



  





 Xledger är ett 100% molnbaserat affärssystem som hjälper företag med
 



 effektivisering och automatisering av ekonomiprocesser. Att sitta
 



 fast i manuella processer är gruset i många företags ekonomiska maskineri.
 



 Därför är automation högt upp på många företags önskelista. Men alla
 



 moln är inte lika. Hos oss finns allt redan i molnet och våra kunder betalar
 



 bara för det dom behöver, 100% molnkraft helt enkelt.
 



  





**Om tjänsten som Specialist** 




 Xledger växer och vi söker en person till tjänsten som Konsult
 



 till vårt kontor i Solna. Vi erbjuder en spännande roll där du får möjlighet
 



 att arbeta med marknadens mest kompletta molnbaserade lösning.
 



 Du har ett genuint intresse av att effektivisera kundernas affärsprocesser
 



 och som konsult arbetar du med implementering av nya
 



 kunders system och stöttar även befintliga kunders automatisering av
 



 sina systemlösningar. I arbetsuppgifterna ingår även analys,design, tester,
 



 utbildning och dokumentation.
 



  





 Du kommer att vara en viktig del av vårt härliga team med drivna specialister och ekonomer. Vi har även tätt samarbete med våra kollegor i Norge, Finland, Storbritannien och USA. Du kan räkna med trevliga kollegor och en prestigelös stämning i ett företag som präglas av en stark och positiv framåtanda.
 



  





**Vad kan vi erbjuda?** 




 • Arbete på ett växande företag med marknadens mest kompletta webbaserade ERP-lösning
 



 • Arbeta med den senaste teknologin i molnet
 



 • Kombinera din erfarenhet som ekonom med ditt intresse för system
 



 • Ett varierat arbete där du är en del av både större projekt och mindre uppdrag
 



 • En trevlig arbetsmiljö med mycket entusiasm, professionell tyngd och stark
 



 kunskapsdelningskultur
 



 • En stark och öppen företagskultur där varje person ges utrymme
 



 att vara med och påverka vår väg framåt
 



 • Ett givande utbyte med kollegor inom Xledger Group
 



 • Det mesta av arbetet utgår från vårt nya fina kontor i Solna, men vi besöker
 



 också våra kunder
 



  





**Vi tror att du behöver:** 




 • Högskoleutbildning inom redovisning och ekonomi eller annan relevant
 



 utbildning och/eller erfarenhet
 



 • Några års erfarenhet av ett företags ekonomiska processer
 



 troligtvis i rollen som redovisningsansvarig, redovisningsekonom, revisor, projektkontroller och/eller support av ekonomisystem, antingen från redovisningsbyrå, systemleverantör
 



 eller kundsidan
 



 • God kompetens inom redovisning och ekonomi
 



 • Kunskap inom koncernredovisning och/eller projektredovisning är också önskvärt
 



 • Stort intresse av systemlösningar och helst ha arbetat med
 



 Xledger alternativt ERP-system såsom Unit4/Agresso, Microsoft,
 



 SAP, Visma, Oracle eller Deltek/Maconomy eller andra liknande system
 



 • Flytande i svenska och engelska (tal och skrift)
 



  





**Vi tror att du är:** 




 • Serviceinriktad, nyfiken och lösningsorienterad
 



 • Självgående, ansvarstagande och pålitlig
 



 • Bra på att samarbeta med våra olika team, kunder och partners
 



 • Prestigelös
 



  





**Om Xledger** 




 Xledger är en norsk privatägd koncern som startades 2001 med målet
 



 att utveckla ett marknadsledande komplett affärssystem på en SaaS plattform.
 



 Idag är Xledger det mest kompletta molnbaserade affärssystemet
 



 på marknaden och har under de senaste åren etablerat sig som den ledande
 



 webbaserade ERP-leverantören för mellanstora och stora verksamheter.
 



 Med en helhetslösning förenklar vi vardagen för 11 000 företag i över
 



 60 länder genom att automatisera ekonomiprocesser. Xledger Group
 



 har 250 anställda och dotterbolag som säljer och levererartjänsten i
 



 Sverige, Norge, Finland, Storbritannien och USA.
 



  





**Nästa steg** 




 I denna rekrytering samarbetar vi med 10TON Rekrytering. Har du några
 



 frågor är du välkommen att kontakta rekryteringskonsult Hans Wahlgren
 



 på 10TON Rekrytering på hans@tioton.com. Vi har ingen sista ansökningsdag
 



 och intervjuer sker löpande så ansök gärna redan idag.

description:

title: Data Management Architect -Stockholm (Hybrid)
description:
**Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a Data Management Architect -Stockholm (Hybrid)**
* Full-time position
* Location: Stockholm (Hybrid – 60% Remote)


**Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our Data Management Architect -Stockholm (Hybrid)**
**About VIPAS**
 Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.
   

  

**Job Description**
 Are you a data management expert with a strong understanding of how data governance drives business value? We’re looking for a talented
 **Data Management Architect** 
 to join our
 **AI, Analytics, and Data Tech Center** 
 within the
 **Data Governance Community Unit** 
 . In this key role, you'll design the future data management architecture, drive collaboration across teams, and evaluate cutting-edge tools and technologies. Your work will help create a unified, fit-for-purpose data infrastructure that supports both operational and analytical needs.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Assess Analyze: Evaluate current data management practices and tools to identify gaps and opportunities for improvement.
* Design the Future: Lead the development of a target data architecture and roadmap for data management, ensuring it aligns with business needs and goals.
* Drive Technology Decisions: Lead the requirements-gathering process and help define RFI/RFP for acquiring new data management technologies.
* Educate Empower: Act as the subject matter expert, providing guidance and training on data management best practices to both technical teams and business stakeholders.
* Collaborate: Work closely with data governance specialists, information architects, and cross-functional teams to ensure alignment and successful implementation of a federated data governance model.


**Requirements**
* Expertise in Data Management Governance: Proven experience in designing and implementing data management strategies in large enterprises, with a focus on data governance.
* Target Architecture Tooling: Hands-on experience in defining target data architectures and evaluating data management tools.
* Stakeholder Engagement: Strong communication and collaboration skills to engage with technical teams and business stakeholders.
* RFI/RFP Requirements Gathering: Experience in collecting requirements and leading RFI/RFP processes.
* Leadership: Ability to mentor teams and drive the adoption of data management best practices.
* Agile Project Management: Familiarity with agile methodologies and project management.
* (Preferred) Experience with project management and agile methodologies.
* Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, in English.


**Why Join Us**
 Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
   

  

 You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!
   

  

**Apply Now Please feel free to reach me at sandhya@vipas.se**
 Note: Please do apply if you have
 **Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit**
**How to Apply:** 
 Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!
   

  

 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Senior Sales Executive - New Business - PSO
description:
Meet Unit4. We’re a fast-paced growth cloud company, changing the game in ERP for mid-market people-centric organizations. We’re on a mission to turn 40 years of conventional legacy ERP software on its head and re-write the industry.
   

  





 We are in Business for People, empowering people in service organizations with innovative Enterprise and Business software solutions. We’ve innovated and taken a new approach to delivering ERP that works for people. Self-driving, adaptive and intuitive software that is changing the way people work. Our solutions empower people and deliver a better people experience so people can spend time on meaningful high value work they live for.
   

  





 Read more on our website about how we transform work and how people feel about it, so our customers and their people can thrive.
   

  





  

  

  

  




**Job Description**

 We have a fantastic opportunity within Unit4 for a New Business Account Manager to join our successful, growing and highly motivated sales team. In this senior role, you will be directly responsible for selling Unit 4's ERP Financial and HCM solutions as part of a digital transformation strategy into new logo prospects in the medium enterprise market. You'll focus on our Professional Services Organisations vertical.
   

  





 The position will be remote, but we are only considering candidates who live in the Stockholm region.
   

  




* Develop a new business sales plan and strategy to win new logo license sales revenue in line with specific sales targets, taking ownership of a specific vertical
* Effectively qualify leads and identify prospect needs, engaging technical resources as required
* You will drive complex sales cycles orchestrating internal teams of pre-sales, value engineering, professional services, inside sales, marketing and sales support.
* You will use your experience and consultative selling skills to build relationships with prospective customers and executive sponsors.
* Conducting highly effective presentations to C-level executives and key C-suite level decision makers focusing on the Office of the CFO
* You will work with customers to determine and highlight business benefits that will be achieved by investing in our solutions
* Utilise MS Dynamics to provide timely and accurate sales activity tracking and status updates
* Furthermore, you will keep yourself up-to-date with all relevant technologies used by Unit4 and changes in the sector, including an appropriate level of understanding of the solutions we provide


**Qualifications**
* We're looking for new logo hunters with a background in selling complex SaaS solutions
* At least 8 - 10 years of relevant experience
* Mandory experience selling ERP or other financial SaaS solutions
* Knowledge of the Professional Service Organisations sector would be an advantage
* An excellent understanding of business processes
* A lively and enthusiastic personality, which you transfer onto your colleagues
* A true negotiator. You keep your and your client’s needs and wants in mind
* Individual Contributor with leadership qualities yet a team player with a solution sales mindset in order to help customers solve their toughest challenges
* Mentor and guide sales teams as subject matter expert
* Maintain Executive Presence by representing Unit4 CMP to analysts, at Key Trade Shows
* Experience selling to CxO suite


**Additional Information**

 At Unit4, we offer:
   

  




* a culture built on trust - giving you the freedom and autonomy to be successful,
* Balance - with our uncapped time off policy, remote working opportunities, and Global Wellbeing Days when the whole company can switch off and prioritize well-being,
* talented colleagues, role models and mentors - work, learn and be inspired by some of the best talent in the software industry,
* a commitment to sustainability - with initiatives such as our Act4Good program, a way for everyone at Unit4 to come together and engage in actions that benefit society and the planet,
* a safe and inclusive working environment – supported by our Employee Resource Groups, which are open to all and include Women at Unit4, Pride at Unit4, Mental Health and Access at Unit4, and People of Color at Unit4.

title: Technical Cyber Security Consultant
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Computer and Network Security, and Software Development
description:
******Join the Cybersecurity Dream Team at WithSecure!******
 Are you a skilled penetration tester eager to tackle cybersecurity challenges alongside industry leaders? WithSecure is your ultimate career destination!
   

  

 We excel at identifying vulnerabilities, exploiting weaknesses, and providing unwavering support to our clients, who in turn support society. As some of the top ethical hackers globally, we offer you the opportunity to learn from the best in the field.
   

  

**Why WithSecure?**
 At WithSecure, we don’t just offer jobs; we offer careers that make a global impact. Every day, our diverse and dynamic team battles online extortion, defends national infrastructure, and prevents the unlawful spread of sensitive information. The best part about working for WithSecure? Our people! We are a community of dedicated and passionate professionals who prioritize workplace happiness. If you’re looking for something more than just a job, we’d love to hear from you.
   

  

**Your Role and Impact**
**Skills**
 We have openings for mid-level and senior technical cybersecurity consultants in Sweden. Your role will include penetration testing and security assessments, tailored to your interests and career goals. Depending on your skills and aspirations, your role can include, but won’t be limited to:
   

  

* Application Security: Dive deep into code to uncover vulnerabilities and secure applications.
* Cloud Security Assessments: Evaluate and fortify cloud infrastructures against sophisticated threats.
* Mainframe Security Assessments: Ensure the security of critical mainframe systems.
* Purple Teaming: Collaborate with blue teams to enhance defensive strategies through simulated attacks.
* Red Team & Targeted Attack Simulations: Conduct advanced attack simulations to test and improve organizational defences.


 The ideal candidate will be eager to produce ground-breaking security research and contribute to WithSecure Labs. WithSecure will invest in your education and provide maximum support to keep your skills sharp and relevant.
   

  

**What We Need**
 An ideal candidate will have 3+ years of experience in security consulting, as well as:
   

  

* Relevant industry certifications (OSCP/OSEP/OSCE) or working towards CCT or similar certifications
* A relevant degree (e.g., Computer Science)
* Cloud experience is a plus


**What It Takes To Succeed**
 Passion for Security: Our consultants are tech enthusiasts who live and breathe cybersecurity. If this wasn’t your job, it would be your hobby. At WithSecure Consulting, we believe in technical excellence as a testament to our passion.
   

  

 Self-Motivation: You won’t be micromanaged. With an understanding of what is important to the business and our clients, you will have the freedom to determine how your time is best spent. We are an output-driven business, and your results are what ultimately matter.
   

  

 Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills are as crucial as your technical abilities. You will need to explain complex technical issues to a wide range of audiences, including senior business stakeholders.
   

  

**Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion**
 We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace that values and respects all people, regardless of their background, identity, or experience. We believe that diversity and inclusion are essential for our success as a company and for our customers’ satisfaction. We encourage applications from people of all backgrounds, abilities, and perspectives.
   

  

 At WithSecure, you'll work alongside some of the best security experts in the world. We've built a team of highly skilled individuals who are passionate about improving information security and cyber resilience. If you're ready to challenge conventional wisdom and help companies stay secure, WithSecure Consulting is the place for you.
   

  

 If you have any questions about WithSecure or the position, please don't hesitate to contact me!
   

  

 belinda.hasselqvist@withsecure.com

title: Solution Consultant (Pre-sales, Swedish speaker)
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Software Development
description:
**Company Description**
 Nexthink is the leader in digital employee experience management software. The company provides IT leaders with unprecedented insight allowing them to see, diagnose and fix issues at scale impacting employees anywhere, with any application or network, before employees notice the issue. As the first solution to allow IT to progress from reactive problem solving to proactive optimization, Nexthink enables its more than 1,200 customers to provide better digital experiences to more than 15 million employees. Dual headquartered in Lausanne, Switzerland and Boston, Massachusetts, Nexthink has 9 offices worldwide.
   

  

**Job Description**
 In 2024 Nexthink was named a Leader in 2024 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ DEX Tools and Forrester EUEM Wave™.
   

  

 In order to support the growth of the Nexthink business in Northern Europe, we are looking to expand our Solution Consulting team with a Solution Consultant in Sweden. As a Solution Consultant, you’ll focus on creating and delivering innovative value propositions to executive audiences by matching Nexthink’s technical capabilities to business outcomes. The primary purpose of the role is to drive pre-sales activities in the local territory to achieve the company’s target sales revenue and growth.
   

  

 Working as a key player within the territory, the Solution Consultant is expected to work collaboratively with the Sales, Professional Services and Partner teams to understand sales and business priorities and to align their activity with the needs of the local business.
   

  

**The role:**
* Help the sales team qualify leads by using your deep understanding of product capabilities to address business issues and provide business value.
* Demonstrate how Nexthink solutions can support overall customer initiatives and how this generates the business outcome.
* Conduct and manage Proof of Values.
* Work with multiple stakeholders in different functions such as End User Computing, Workplace Management, IT Operations and IT Leadership to illustrate use cases where Nexthink can add value. This requires strong account management capability as well as a passion and enthusiasm for introducing disruptive technology.
* Support and lead large-scale enterprise transactions as a Solution Consultant by using industry knowledge and client management skills.
* Run and facilitate value-based workshops with prospects so that they can fully discover and understand how Nexthink can address their strategic projects and major issues.
* Participate as a speaker in key company events and other marketing-related activities.
* Become a thought leader both internally and externally around driving business value with Nexthink.
* Run Partner training workshops to ensure the technical teams of our Partners are knowledgeable in the solution.
* This is a field-based role and will require up to 50% of travelling, mostly within the region.


**Qualifications**
